name: Settler's Odyssey
description:
Welcome to undeveloped new lands, settler!

Here you have to survive in the difficult conditions of unknown lands!
Be careful, because it is full of mysteries and unfriendly robots. Solve the mystery of these robots and protect your people and your settlement!
Here's what you'll be doing:

Mining.
Over 50 types of resources required to craft all your equipment, weapons and buildings. Mine, store and explore new lands!

Dungeons with robots and bosses.
Explore dungeons, solve puzzles and get valuable resources and rewards! For each cleared dungeon, you will receive a valuable part with which you can create your own robot and send it to extract resources!

Build!
You can build your own house however you want, anywhere on the map! But do not forget that you will have to build houses for all the survivors and help them!

Grow plants!
Grow rare flowers and plants, with their help you can cook recipes and food that will help you!
You will get bonuses to hp, experience and much more!

Write yor own odyssey, Settler!
